<!-- Portfolio Website Project Instructions -->

This is a Node.js portfolio website project built with:

- Express.js for the server
- Vanilla JavaScript for frontend interactions
- Responsive CSS for styling
- Portfolio sections for career, dev community, digital work, and analog art

Project Structure:

- `/public` - Static assets (HTML, CSS, JS, images)
- `/views` - EJS templates
- `/routes` - Express route handlers
- `server.js` - Main application entry point
- `package.json` - Dependencies and scripts

Development Guidelines:

- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Progressive enhancement with vanilla JS
- Clean, modular CSS architecture
- Express.js best practices for routing
